text: __NOTOC__ Year 254 (CCLIV) was a common year starting on Sunday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Publius Licinius Valerianus Augustus and Publius Licinius Egnatius Gallienus become Roman Consuls. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * May 12 - Pope Stephen I succeeds Pope Lucius I as the 23rd pope. == Births == * == Deaths == * Li Feng * Xiahou Xuan, minister of Wei and son of Xiahou Shang (b. 209)
